Generation V.Black: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.
Generation V.White: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.
Generation V.Black 2: Wanting more garbage, they follow people who litter. They always belch poison gas.
Generation V.White 2: Wanting more garbage, they follow people who litter. They always belch poison gas.

Generation VI.X: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.
Generation VI.Y: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.

Generation VII.Sun: Unsanitary places are what they like best. They can be spotted in Alola, often with Grimer in hot pursuit.
Generation VII.Moon: It gorges on trash until its stomach is full. Then it belches toxic gas. An unlucky whiff of gas will put a person in the hospital.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Poisonous gas leaks out of it when it breathes. Muk that catch a whiff of that stench will come drooling.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: If a young Pokémon or child breathes in the toxic gas that Trubbish belches out, it could be a life-threatening situation.

Generation VIII.Sword: Its favorite places are unsanitary ones. If you leave trash lying around, you could even find one of these Pokémon living in your room.
Generation VIII.Shield: This Pokémon was born from a bag stuffed with trash. Galarian Weezing relish the fumes belched by Trubbish.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 3 East Lake Axewell , North Lake Miloch , Motostoke Riverbank , Giant's Cap ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 3 East Lake Axewell , North Lake Miloch , Motostoke Riverbank , Giant's Cap ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Giant's Bed , Snowslide Slope , Ballimere Lake ( Max Raid Battle )
